Label: SC_STANDARD_RATE
Comment: "Maybank mentions end user pays standard SMS charges for messaging 66628:\nhttps://www.maybank2u.com.my/iwov-resources/pdf/personal/promotions/MUCards_TnC.pdf"

Label: XML_FIXED_LINE
Comment:
"Prefixes 32778, 39108, 6795, 82266, 905[79], 9075, 9132 and 9206 are added based on user
reports. Maintaining prefix data at 3 digit granularity as the new fixed-line ranges are
being added frequently in mcmc.gov.my docs. This avoids false negatives and eases up the
maintenance."

Label: XML_MOBILE
Comment: "Although the plan lists the prefix 159 as broadband services (data only), apparently it\nis possible to send SMSs (and receive them) from numbers in this block, so we are\nlisting them as mobile. 11[4-6] was added based on numbers found online."
